page.title: 03HAREWOOD HOUSE:ORGANISATION
page.content: Harewood House receives 200000 visitors each year.The most popular months are July and August.Three main groups of people visit:tourists;day trippers and school children(on outings).The latter tend to come in the first and second weeks of June. The House is open 7 months of the year,all Sundays and national holidays.Sunday is the most popular day of the week for visitors. Apart from Harewood House itself, there are many other attractions.There is the bird garden which contains many types of bird, and a lake which you can walk round.For children there is an adventure playground and picnic area.If you prefer to eat inside there are 2 restaurants.Plants,grown in the grounds,may be purchased from the plant centre.
